original_title: David Icke: Live at Oxford Union Debating Society
overview: Since his extraordinary awakening in the early 1990s, David Icke has been on a journey around the world and within himself, to find the BIG answers to the BIG questions: Who are we? Where are we? What are we doing here? Who really controls this world - how and why?
title: David Icke: Live at Oxford Union Debating Society
